text.div:
This value set includes codes based on the following rules:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-ActCode
    CodeDisplayDefinition
    COVPRDcoverage periodCodes representing the time period during which coverage is available; or financial participation requirements are in effect.
    NETAMTNet AmountMaximum net amount that will be covered for the product or service specified.
    UNITPRICEUnit PriceMaximum unit price that will be covered for the authorized product or service.
    UNITQTYUnit QuantityMaximum number of items that will be covered of the product or service specified.
  • Include codes from http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-ActCode where concept is-a _ActCoverageQuantityLimitCode

name: ActCoverageQuantityLimitCode
title: ActCoverageQuantityLimitCode
description: Maximum amount paid or maximum number of services/products covered; or maximum amount or number covered during a specified time period under the policy or program.
